text: Dar rohi Xudovand, cunon ki ʙojad cihod kuned. U sumoro ʙarguzid. Va ʙarojaton dar din hec tangnoe padid najovard. Dini padaraton Iʙrohim ast. U pes az in va dar in sumoro musalmon nomid. To pajomʙar ʙar sumo guvoh ʙosad va sumo ʙar digar mardum guvoh ʙosed. Pas namoz ʙiguzored va zakot ʙidihed va ʙa Xudo iʙodat kuned! Ust mavloi sumo. Ci mavloe neku va ci jovare neku
